snippet.title: PS5/Xbox Series S|X/Steam "Ed-0: Zombie Uprising" Pre-order Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Be ready to sweat your hands and brain, cuz it’s time for O-EDO-ZOMBIE!! A zombie-filed survival rogue-like action title,  Ed-0: Zombie Uprising for PS5 XBOX Series S|X and Steam(PC) will be released on July 13, 2023! Pre-orders with mini-quest starts!

PS Store
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10006465/

Microsoft Store
https://www.microsoft.com/store/ed-0-zombieuprising/9phfhd4659fl

Steam(PC)
https://store.steampowered.com/agecheck/app/1717020/

For any comments or requests on the game, please contact us on the official Discord.
https://discord.gg/4dMMPXqKV3

Official website for "Ed-0: Zombie Uprising"
https://www.d3p.co.jp/ed-0/

D3P official twitter
https://twitter.com/D3_PUBLISHER
